data.chiefComplaint: Most likely gastric infection, possible bacterial, needs blood test.
data.treatmentPlan: Buscopan 10mg oral twice daily for 7 days
data.notes:
SOAP Notes:
S: Chief Complaint: Most likely gastric infection, possible bacterial, needs blood test.
Symptoms: diarrhea, fever
O: Vitals: BP 150/110 mmHg, HR 90 bpm, Temp 40C, SpO2 96%, RR 19/min
NEWS2 Score: 2 (LOW)
A: Infectious gastroenteritis and colitis, unspecified (A09) - 70% confidence
Type 2 diagnosis (DFV1) [PRIMARY] [Custom]
P: Buscopan 10mg oral twice daily for 7 days

Recommended Tests: Hemoglobin A1c, Complete Blood Count (CBC), Stool PCR Panel, Basic Metabolic Panel (BMP), Stool Culture
